features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with email/password, email verification, password reset, and session management using Supabase Auth

features.name: AI Agent Configuration
features.description: Setup and configure AI voice agents with business details, system prompts, voice selection (Vapi default for free tier, Minimax TTS for paid tiers), and knowledge base upload

features.name: Voice Call System
features.description: Tier-based voice call testing with Vapi integration, voice call tester component, and webhook integration for call logging

features.name: Chat Widget
features.description: AI-powered chat widget using Groq AI for customer interactions on landing pages, with session management and message history

features.name: Dashboard & Analytics
features.description: User dashboard displaying call analytics, statistics, performance metrics, and real-time data visualization

features.name: Leads Management
features.description: Track and manage leads generated from calls and chats, with lead status tracking, assignment, and analytics

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Subscription management with Flutterwave integration, tier-based pricing (Free, Pro, Professional, Promax), payment link generation, and subscription status tracking

features.name: User Management & Settings
features.description: User profile management, settings updates, subscription management, and user tier detection

features.name: Landing Page Components
features.description: Marketing landing page with hero section, features showcase, pricing tiers, how it works section, and navigation

features.name: Layout & Routing
features.description: Application routing with protected routes, layout components, error boundaries, and navigation structure

features.name: Design System & Utilities
features.description: Design system configuration, utility functions, and shared UI components using TailwindCSS and Radix UI

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Database client configuration, type definitions, and Supabase service integration for users, leads, call_logs, assistants, and payments tables
